about_the_game:
The Music Collection Package for Falsemen: Demon Rebirth. After purchase, additional OST folders will be generated in the game installation directory, which has 14 original games in MP3 format.

Buying this DLC will not have any effect on the content of the game ontology. Players who want to collect music or support us extra are welcome to purchase this DLC.



It contains 12 pieces of music that have appeared in the game, namely:

003 The Period

005 Emperor

008 Dark Legion

012 Terror Error

019 Underground

020 Weird

033 Endless Sea

034 Door Open

050 Come From Dark

051 For Honor

056 Enemies Attack

062 Queen




And the two pieces of music that did not appear in the game are:

014 Expulsion

046 Breakout
